translations: 装有轮胎的：指车辆或其他物体上安装了轮胎。
· The tyred wheels make it easier to move the heavy equipment.
装有轮胎的轮子使得搬运重型设备变得更容易。

sentences.sentence: This is called a rubber-tyred container gantry crane.
sentences.translation: 这是一种叫做轮胎式集装箱龙门起重机。

sentences.sentence: A bicycle can’t stand on its own because it is two-tyred.
sentences.translation: 这句话的表面意思是：自行车自己站不起来，因为它只有两个轮胎（two-tyred）。

sentences.sentence: A bicycle can't stand on its own because it is two-tyred.
sentences.translation: 这句话的表面意思是：自行车自己站不起来，因为它只有两个轮胎（two-tyred）。
